issue.title: [Rust] Implement logical equality for list arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11125](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11125). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We implemented logical equality for struct arrays, but not list arrays.

This work is now required for the Parquet nested list writer.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11125?focusedCommentId=17259152) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9093
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9093>
